title: Top Places to visit in Karbi Anglong, Diphu, Assam
content: Karbi Anglong district is one of the 33 administrative districts of Assam state in India. The district is bounded by Golaghat district on the east, Morigaon district on the west, Nagaon and Golaghat districts on the north and Dima Hasao district and Nagaland state on the south.
